definition: the work of coating glass with metal foil
details:
noun
- the work of coating glass with metal foil
- the production of foil by cutting or beating metal into thin leaves
- leaf-like architectural ornament
= example: leaf-like architectural ornament
= synonyms: foliage
- (geology) the arrangement of leaflike layers in a rock
- (botany) the process of forming leaves
= synonyms: leafing
